All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CitiesReaderRepository
This class is responsible for reading city data from a TSV file and providing access to it.
City
Represents a city with basic information including its ID, name, latitude, and longitude.
CityDAO
Represents a Data Access Object (DAO) for city information, extending the City class.
CorsConfig
 
DistanceUtils
Utility class for calculating distances between two geographical coordinates using the Haversine formula.
Suggestion
Represents a suggestion based on a city, including a score.
SuggestionApplication
 
SuggestionController
Controller class responsible for handling suggestions-related HTTP requests.
SuggestionResponse
A data class representing a response containing a list of suggestions.
SuggestionService
The SuggestionService class provides methods for generating location suggestions based on a user query and geographical coordinates.
